title: Thunderbird freezing whenever I open a folder in a new tab or window
content:
Since installing Supernova, I find a huge (multiple minute) delay whenever I open a folder to a new tab or window. There was zero delay on the prior version to open a folder, so it appears to be specific to Supernova. I'm surprised that no one else has mentioned it on the forums yet, so it seems it might just be something about my particular setup. Can anyone help me diagnose what I might be doing wrong?

Thanks!
creator: lowraxe

title: Update to Thunderbird 115 seems to have deleted all my read emails including IMAP on all devices.
creator: bsteener

title: Image in html footer won't load in
content:
on a PC running TB v102, my simple html email footer includes an image (in the same folder) the image loads in to new emails fine,

however a PC running latest TB v115, the same html file & image, does not load the image into new emails, just blank rectangle (viewing the html file in a browser does work) 

Any thoughts ?
creator: MikeShegog1

title: Muliple new emails downloaded
content: When I get new emails I get multiple copies as well as emails I previously downloaded
creator: TomCU
